attributes.action: make sure that the government work together to do the job we elected them for instead of wasting time with continual infighting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are fed up listening to politicians continually making personal attacks and showing no sign of being professional about their jobs. If we spent out working hours undermining managers/ enployers we would be sacked. 
Ministers should voice their complaints about their leaders within the appropriate meetings.
It's the oppositions job to voice complaints.
I want the government to put their energies into leading and try to do something to remind us that they are people of integrity

rejection.details: Your petition should be a clear call for action that relates to government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
